job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: pstronguNO CTCustrongppbrppstrongJob DescriptionstrongppThis role with the Funding team within Corporate Treasury entails development and maintenance of data analytics and visualization tools that provide business insights meet management reporting needs and automate business tasks The job involves coordination with teams within the Corporate Treasury and Technology organizations to identify business requirements and to deliver tools that satisfy those requirementsppbrppThe developer will build data pipelines by sourcing data from various upstream systems and housing it within a relational database in a format that facilitates consumption by frontend tools The data pipeline will be developed using a combination of technologies including Python Oracle and AMPS The developer will also create data analytics and visualization tools using Python Microsoft Excel and TableauppbrppstrongRequired Skillsstrongpulli5 years of overall development experiencelili2 years building data pipelines and visualization toolslili2 years of Python and data analytics using Pandaslili2 years of Oracle SQL developmentlili1 year programming Microsoft Excel VBA charts pivot and data tablesliulpstrongNice to havestrongpulliExperience in R programmingliliExperience building Tableau visualizationsliliExperience with Git version control Perl and LinuxliliFamiliarity with Oracle analytics performance tuning and administrationliulpstrongEducationnbspstrongpulliAt minimum a bachelors degree in Engineering ComputerData Science or a quantitative disciplineliulpbrppbrppREMOTE UNTIL FURTHER NOTICEp
